# Discussions Categories Setup

GitHub Discussions categories must be configured manually via the web interface. Follow these steps to set up the recommended structure:

## Steps

1. Go to [https://github.com/NJX-njx/opensoul/discussions](https://github.com/NJX-njx/opensoul/discussions)
2. Click **Categories** in the left sidebar (or the edit icon next to it)
3. Click **New category** and add the following:

| Category Name     | Emoji | Format     | Description                                      |
| ----------------- | ----- | ---------- | ------------------------------------------------ |
| **General**       | ğŸ’¬    | Open-ended | General discussion about OpenSoul                |
| **Q&A**           | â“    | Q&A        | Ask questions and get answers from the community |
| **Show and Tell** | ğŸ‰    | Open-ended | Share your setup, integrations, or creative uses |
| **Feature Ideas** | ğŸ’¡    | Open-ended | Suggest new features or improvements             |
| **ä¸­æ–‡ç¤¾åŒº**      | ğŸ‡¨ğŸ‡³    | Open-ended | ä¸­æ–‡è®¨è®ºåŒº                                       |

## Notes

- **Q&A** format allows marking a reply as the accepted answer
- **Open-ended** is best for free-form discussion
- You can reorder categories by dragging
- Limit: 25 categories per repository
